S3Client Class

Source: R/s3.R
S3Client.Rd

An R6 class that manages the S3 client for AWS authentication and access.

Methods

Public methods

  • S3Client$new()

  • S3Client$client()

  • S3Client$error()

  • S3Client$set_role()

  • S3Client$set_session_vars()

  • S3Client$set_client_params()

  • S3Client$clone()

Method new()

Create a new S3Client object.

Usage

S3Client$new(
  s3_role_arn = NULL,
  s3_session_vars = NULL,
  s3_client_params = NULL
)

Arguments

s3_role_arn

Optional character string specifying the AWS role ARN.

s3_session_vars

Optional list of session variables.

s3_client_params

Optional list of client parameters.

Method client()

Get the S3 client.

Usage

S3Client$client()

Returns

The S3 client object.

Method error()

Get the error associated with the S3 client.

Usage

S3Client$error()

Returns

The error object, if any.

Method set_role()

Set the AWS role for the S3 client.

Usage

S3Client$set_role(role)

Arguments

role

Character string specifying the AWS role ARN.

Method set_session_vars()

Set the session variables for the S3 client.

Usage

S3Client$set_session_vars(session_vars)

Arguments

session_vars

List of session variables.

Method set_client_params()

Set the client parameters for the S3 client.

Usage

S3Client$set_client_params(client_params)

Arguments

client_params

List of client parameters.

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

S3Client$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
